Get model predictions

model_predictions.Rd

Calculate predictions (fitted values) and prediction intervals for a linear model.

Usage

model_predictions(
  model,
  at,
  newdata,
  level = 0.95,
  backtransform = TRUE,
  se_fit = FALSE
)

Arguments

model

a linear model

at

the values for each predictor to predict at; uses all combinations of specified values

newdata

alternative to at, to specify specific combinations of predictors to predict at

level

desired prediction level

backtransform

whether or not to backtransform predictions from models on the log scale

se_fit

whether or not to report the standard error of the predicted value
